actions

Class TakeResourceAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • actions.Action
      • actions.TakeResourceAction

  • public class TakeResourceAction
extends Action
    TakeResourceAction in a concrete action.

    It takes a resource from a ResourcePool to get it in the ResourcefulUser .

    Author:
    Marine Bal & Alexandre Moevi & Theo Plockyn
